snippet: Dominique Badji scored, Zac McMath made three saves and the Colorado Rapids beat the New England Revolution 1-0 on Saturday night in the season opener for both teams....

headline.main: Klingberg's Late Goal Lifts Stars Over Panthers 2-1
headline.print_headline: Klingberg's Late Goal Lifts Stars Over Panthers 2-1

lead_paragraph: Dominique Badji scored, Zac McMath made three saves and the Colorado Rapids beat the New England Revolution 1-0 on Saturday night in the season opener for both teams.
